title: @Riot
body:
Hey Riot, 

i really hope i get banned since your system is so stupid! if my team is toxic and abusive and dont want me to help, i have every right not to, but it does not make it ok for them to report me and i get banned for it! its stupid and pathetic how the system bans people like me who do nothing while the others get away with out a warning because is 4:1.

replies.body: You don't get banned *just* for being reported, that's not how the system works. If you've done the wrong thing, a ban is a likely outcome, but if you've done nothing wrong you wont get punished. It's really that simple. It doesn't matter if 1 person or 9 people report you, the outcome will be the same.

well sure for actual bans thats how it works but for chat restrictions all takes is a couple of reports from people who are lv30 and never been  banned and youll enjoy the next 15 games only being able to type once every few minutes
i can tell you're toxic by the 1st line after hey riot
lmao ok kid, ive got recordings of games and since i stream i can get many vouches so please before you post dont be a kid?
